name: Ryan Howard
quotes: I'm not a temp anymore. I got Jim's old job. Which means at my 10-year high school reunion, it will not say 'Ryan Howard is a temp'. It will say 'Ryan Howard is a junior sales associate at a midrange paper supply firm'.
You know what, I would love to hear more about the minutiae of the Dunder Mifflin paper business.
Wikipedia is the best thing ever. Anyone in the world can write anything they want about any subject. So you know you are getting the best possible information.
I don’t want to be here until I’m 40.
I miss the days when there was only one party I didn't want to go to.
A few years ago, my family was on a safari in Africa and my cousin, Mufasa, was um, he was trampled to death by a pack of wildebeests and um, we all took it really hard.
